0: The breakfast is served in the central atrium which provides a nice white noise to fill the huge interior volume
Excellent service wonderful breakfast included snacks and drinks each night nice pool area
I think they are a great asset to this hotel
My family stayed here the night before leaving on a cruise
Daniele and Kieth are wonderful energetic employees who place customer service above all else
The Embassy was amazing and happy we ended up there but NOT very happy how we ended up there
It ’s all very well sticking up signs at breakfast to say your bagels are sourced locally when at the same time you are providing single use plastic bowls for your porridge oatmeal
1: It was a little unnerving and in truth not what I would expect from an Embassy Suite
Customer service was very lacking which is not the norm I have gotten at other embassy suites
Pool closes at 10 which I felt was early considering they did not have any inside and it is a vacation spot
Also the morning the breakfast was good but the omelts because of the over cooked bacon
The appetizers were not great but FREE NOT WATERED DOWN
Also the sink in our bathroom did n’t drain well
The ice machines are a little noisy through the night
I wish they had put that in the website when I booked
The buffet was very crowded with out sufficient refills thus people waited and waited
